TestNSXReturnThrowError.m

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #import <Foundation/Foundation.h>
00002 #import "NSXReturnThrowError.m"
00003 #include <mach/error.h>
00004 
00005 //--
00006 
00007 static OSErr returnNoOSErr() { return 0; }
00008 static OSStatus returnNoOSStatus() { return 0; }
00009 static int returnNoPosixErr() { return 0; }
00010 static mach_error_t returnNoMach_error() { return err_none; }
00011 static id returnObjCInstance() { return [NSFileManager defaultManager]; }
00012 static char* returnGoodCharPtr(){ return "foo"; }
00013 static int* returnGoodIntPtr(){ static int dummy = 42; return &dummy; }
00014 static BOOL returnGoodBool(){ return YES; }
00015 
00016 static OSErr returnOSErr() { return qErr; }
00017 static OSStatus returnOSStatus() { return qErr; }
00018 static int returnPosixErr() { errno = EPERM; return -1; }
00019 static mach_error_t returnMach_error() { return err_local|1; }
00020 static id returnNilObjCInstance() { return nil; }
00021 static char* returnBadCharPtr(){ return NULL; }
00022 static int* returnBadIntPtr(){ return NULL; }
00023 static BOOL returnBadBool(){ return NO; }
00024 
00025 //--
00026 
00027 int main (int argc, const char * argv[]) {
00028     NSAutoreleasePool *pool = [[NSAutoreleasePool alloc] init];
00029     NSError *error = nil;
00030     
00031     //--
00032     
00033     #define errorCodeTypeFromRValue(RVALUE) NSXErrorCodeTypeFromObjCType(@encode(typeof(RVALUE)))
00034     assert(NSXErrorCodeType_Carbon == errorCodeTypeFromRValue(returnNoOSErr()));
00035     assert(NSXErrorCodeType_Carbon == errorCodeTypeFromRValue(returnNoOSStatus()));
00036     assert(NSXErrorCodeType_PosixOrMach == errorCodeTypeFromRValue(returnNoPosixErr()));
00037     assert(NSXErrorCodeType_PosixOrMach == errorCodeTypeFromRValue(returnNoMach_error()));
00038     assert(NSXErrorCodeType_Cocoa == errorCodeTypeFromRValue(returnObjCInstance()));
00039     
00040     //--
00041     
00042     NSXReturnError(returnNoOSErr());
00043         assert(!error);
00044     NSXReturnError(returnNoOSStatus());
00045         assert(!error);
00046     NSXReturnError(returnNoPosixErr());
00047         assert(!error);
00048     NSXReturnError(returnNoMach_error());
00049         assert(!error);
00050     NSXReturnError(returnObjCInstance());
00051         assert(!error);
00052     NSXReturnError(returnGoodCharPtr());
00053         assert(!error);
00054     NSXReturnError(returnGoodIntPtr());
00055         assert(!error);
00056     NSXReturnError(returnGoodBool());
00057         assert(!error);
00058     
00059     //--
00060     
00061     NSXReturnError(returnOSErr());
00062         assert(error);
00063         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSOSStatusErrorDomain]);
00064         assert([error code] == qErr);
00065         error = nil;
00066     NSXReturnError(returnOSStatus());
00067         assert(error);
00068         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSOSStatusErrorDomain]);
00069         assert([error code] == qErr);
00070         error = nil;
00071     NSXReturnError(returnPosixErr());
00072         assert(error);
00073         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSPOSIXErrorDomain]);
00074         assert([error code] == EPERM);
00075         error = nil;
00076     NSXReturnError(returnMach_error());
00077         assert(error);
00078         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSMachErrorDomain]);
00079         assert([error code] == (err_local|1));
00080         error = nil;
00081     NSXReturnError(returnNilObjCInstance());
00082         assert(error);
00083         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSCocoaErrorDomain]);
00084         assert([error code] == -1);
00085         error = nil;
00086     NSXReturnError(returnBadCharPtr());
00087         assert(error);
00088         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NULLPointerErrorDomain]);
00089         assert([error code] == -1);
00090         error = nil;
00091     NSXReturnError(returnBadIntPtr());
00092         assert(error);
00093         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NULLPointerErrorDomain]);
00094         assert([error code] == -1);
00095         error = nil;
00096     NSXReturnError(returnBadBool());
00097         assert(error);
00098         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:BOOLErrorDomain]);
00099         assert([error code] == -1);
00100         error = nil;
00101     
00102     //--
00103     
00104     NS_DURING
00105         NSXThrowError(returnOSErr());
00106         assert(0);
00107     NS_HANDLER
00108         assert([[localException name] isEqualToString:@"NSXError"]);
00109         error = [[localException userInfo] objectForKey:@"error"];
00110     NS_ENDHANDLER
00111         assert(error);
00112         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSOSStatusErrorDomain]);
00113         assert([error code] == qErr);
00114         error = nil;
00115     
00116     NS_DURING
00117         NSXThrowError(returnOSStatus());
00118         assert(0);
00119     NS_HANDLER
00120         assert([[localException name] isEqualToString:@"NSXError"]);
00121         error = [[localException userInfo] objectForKey:@"error"];
00122     NS_ENDHANDLER
00123         assert(error);
00124         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSOSStatusErrorDomain]);
00125         assert([error code] == qErr);
00126         error = nil;
00127     
00128     NS_DURING
00129         NSXThrowError(returnPosixErr());
00130         assert(0);
00131     NS_HANDLER
00132         assert([[localException name] isEqualToString:@"NSXError"]);
00133         error = [[localException userInfo] objectForKey:@"error"];
00134     NS_ENDHANDLER
00135         assert(error);
00136         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSPOSIXErrorDomain]);
00137         assert([error code] == EPERM);
00138         error = nil;
00139     
00140     NS_DURING
00141         NSXThrowError(returnMach_error());
00142         assert(0);
00143     NS_HANDLER
00144         assert([[localException name] isEqualToString:@"NSXError"]);
00145         error = [[localException userInfo] objectForKey:@"error"];
00146     NS_ENDHANDLER
00147         assert(error);
00148         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSMachErrorDomain]);
00149         assert([error code] == (err_local|1));

00161         assert([error code] == -1);

00170     NS_ENDHANDLER

00173         assert([error code] == -1);

00180         assert([[localException name] isEqualToString:@"NSXError"]);

00182     NS_ENDHANDLER

00194     NS_ENDHANDLER

00196         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:BOOLErrorDomain]);
00197         assert([error code] == -1);
00198         error = nil;
00199     
00200     //--
00201         
00202     NSXReturnError(open("/does/not/exist", O_RDONLY, 0));
00203         assert(error);
00204         assert([[error domain] isEqualToString:NSPOSIXErrorDomain]);
00205         assert([error code] == ENOENT);
00206         error = nil;
00207     
00208     [pool release];
00209     printf("success\n");
00210     return 0;
